channel.title: Meep...help and i give a bananna
channel.description: uh i recently got a new run.bat but now my server only holds around 10 people, then just...locks itself from other people..is it my run.bat or... heres the code. [code]@echo off title Java Compiler and Runner "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_04/bin/javac.exe" *.java "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_04/bin/java.exe" server pause[/code]

item.title: Meep...help and i give a bananna
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

i know, i never said client.java was the problem…
BTW somethings going on with CMD…
i type ipconfig and says cannot be recognized[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 01, 2008, 08:38:48 PM[/size][hr]hey some help would be nice…

Read full topic

item.title: Meep...help and i give a bananna
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

1337haxaz:

yea … reinstall your source lol O_o

Some people do more than just change the name, so deleting all his current files and replacing them with the sources original files may delete all the work he has done on the server so far.

item.title: Meep...help and i give a bananna
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

uh i recently got a new run.bat but now my server only holds around 10 people, then just…locks itself from other people…is it my run.bat or…
heres the code.

@echo off title Java Compiler and Runner "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_04/bin/javac.exe" *.java "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_04/bin/java.exe" server pause
